019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.StaticCaption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
026import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
027import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.DoneFlag;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
030import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
031import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlotUploader;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.SchematicHandler;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.StringMan;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.WorldUtil;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal;
037import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
038import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
040import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
041
042import java.net.URL;
043import java.util.Collection;
044import java.util.Collections;
045import java.util.LinkedList;
046import java.util.List;
047import java.util.stream.Collectors;
048
049@CommandDeclaration(usage = "/plot download [schem | world]",
050        command = "download",
051        aliases = {"dl"},
052        category = CommandCategory.SCHEMATIC,
053        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
054        permission = "plots.download")
055public class Download extends SubCommand {
056
057    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
058    private final PlotUploader plotUploader;
059    @NonNull
060    private final SchematicHandler schematicHandler;
061    private final WorldUtil worldUtil;
062
063    @Inject
064    public Download(
065            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
066            final @NonNull PlotUploader plotUploader,
067            final @NonNull SchematicHandler schematicHandler,
068            final @NonNull WorldUtil worldUtil
069    ) {
070        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
071        this.plotUploader = plotUploader;
072        this.schematicHandler = schematicHandler;
073        this.worldUtil = worldUtil;
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
078        String world = player.getLocation().getWorldName();
079        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(world)) {
080            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
081            return false;
082        }
083        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
084        if (plot == null) {
085            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
086            return false;
087        }
088        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
089            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
090            return false;
091        }
092        if ((Settings.Done.REQUIRED_FOR_DOWNLOAD && !DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) && !Permissions
093                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_DOWNLOAD)) {
094            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.done_not_done"));
095            return false;
096        }
097        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
098                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN.toString())) {
099            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
100            return false;
101        }
102        if (plot.getRunning() > 0) {
103            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.wait_for_timer"));
104            return false;
105        }
106        if (args.length == 0 || (args.length == 1 && StringMan
107                .isEqualIgnoreCaseToAny(args[0], "sch", "schem", "schematic"))) {
108            if (plot.getVolume() > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
109                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_too_large"));
110                return false;
111            }
112            plot.addRunning();
113            upload(player, plot);
114        } else if (args.length == 1 && StringMan
115                .isEqualIgnoreCaseToAny(args[0], "mcr", "world", "mca")) {
116            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DOWNLOAD_WORLD)) {
117                player.sendMessage(
118                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
119                        TagResolver.resolver(
120                                "node",
121                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_DOWNLOAD_WORLD)
122                        )
123                );
124                return false;
125            }
126            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.mca_file_size"));
127            plot.addRunning();
128            this.worldUtil.saveWorld(world);
129            this.worldUtil.upload(plot, null, null, new RunnableVal<>() {
130                @Override
131                public void run(URL url) {
132                    plot.removeRunning();
133                    if (url == null) {
134                        player.sendMessage(
135                                TranslatableCaption.of("web.generating_link_failed"),
136                                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.getId().toString())))
137                        );
138                        return;
139                    }
140                    player.sendMessage(
141                            TranslatableCaption.of("web.generation_link_success_legacy_world"),
142                            TagResolver.resolver("url", Tag.inserting(Component.text(url.toString())))
143                    );
144                }
145            });
146        } else {
147            sendUsage(player);
148            return false;
149        }
150        player.sendMessage(
151                TranslatableCaption.of("web.generating_link"),
152                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.getId().toString())))
153        );
154        return true;
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public Collection<Command> tab(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args, final boolean space) {
159        if (args.length == 1) {
160            final List<String> completions = new LinkedList<>();
161            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DOWNLOAD)) {
162                completions.add("schem");
163            }
164            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DOWNLOAD_WORLD)) {
165                completions.add("world");
166            }
167            final List<Command> commands = completions.stream().filter(completion -> completion
168                            .toLowerCase()
169                            .startsWith(args[0].toLowerCase()))
170                    .map(completion -> new Command(
171                            null,
172                            true,
173                            completion,
174                            "",
175                            RequiredType.NONE,
176                            CommandCategory.ADMINISTRATION
177                    ) {
178                    }).collect(Collectors.toCollection(LinkedList::new));
179            if (Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_DOWNLOAD) && args[0].length() > 0) {
180                commands.addAll(TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, args[0], Collections.emptyList()));
181            }
182            return commands;
183        }
184        return TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, String.join(",", args).trim(), Collections.emptyList());
185    }
186
187    private void upload(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
188        if (Settings.Web.LEGACY_WEBINTERFACE) {
189            schematicHandler
190                    .getCompoundTag(plot)
191                    .whenComplete((compoundTag, throwable) -> {
192                        schematicHandler.upload(compoundTag, null, null, new RunnableVal<>() {
193                            @Override
194                            public void run(URL value) {
195                                plot.removeRunning();
196                                player.sendMessage(
197                                        TranslatableCaption.of("web.generation_link_success"),
198                                        TagResolver.builder()
199                                                .tag("download", Tag.preProcessParsed(value.toString()))
200                                                .tag("delete", Tag.preProcessParsed("Not available"))
201                                                .build()
202                                );
203                                player.sendMessage(StaticCaption.of(value.toString()));
204                            }
205                        });
206                    });
207            return;
208        }
209        // TODO legacy support
210        this.plotUploader.upload(plot)
211                .whenComplete((result, throwable) -> {
212                    if (throwable != null || !result.isSuccess()) {
213                        player.sendMessage(
214                                TranslatableCaption.of("web.generating_link_failed"),
215                                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.getId().toString())))
216                        );
217                    } else {
218                        player.sendMessage(
219                                TranslatableCaption.of("web.generation_link_success"),
220                                TagResolver.builder()
221                                        .tag("download", Tag.preProcessParsed(result.getDownloadUrl()))
222                                        .tag("delete", Tag.preProcessParsed(result.getDeletionUrl()))
223                                        .build()
224                        );
225                    }
226                });
227    }
228
229}
